channel.title: New command (stuck)
channel.description:
well i want to run a program from a command. like a command ::compile
and it compiles from the source it is being hosted from, i looked at ip ban. witch gave some clues but i still need help
[code]int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID
(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players
[otherPIndex];[/code]
the "playerHandler" is blinking me in the eye. but i want to make it run the program
if u dont understand here [code]p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans"); p.disconnected = true;[/code]
it says write log, would runlog work?? (i want compiler to run from command)
